translations.chinese: 六年春正月丙辰，改舂陵郷為章陵縣。
translations.literal: In the sixth year, spring, first month, on Bingchen day, changed Chunling township to Zhangling county.
translations.idiomatic: In the sixth year, on the Bingchen day of the first month of spring, Chunling township was redesignated as Zhangling county.

translations.literal: I think that the common people have nothing to support themselves with, I am deeply sympathetic to them.

translations.idiomatic: (The Da Dai Li ritual text states: 'A man of sixty without a wife is called a widower; a woman of fifty without a husband is called a widow.'

translations.idiomatic: The generals returned to the capital where banquets were held to reward them.
